00032 template <typename T> std::ostream& operator << (std::ostream& os, std::vector<T> & Vref) {
00033     typename std::vector<T>::const_iterator Vi;
00034     os << "{";
00035     for (Vi = Vref.begin(); Vi != Vref.end(); Vi++) {
00036         os << *Vi;
00037         if (Vi+1 != Vref.end()) os << ", ";
00038     }
00039     os << "}";
00040     return os;
00041 }

00048 template <typename T> std::ostream& operator << (std::ostream& os, std::list<T> Lref) {
00049     int i = 0;
00050     typename std::list<T>::const_iterator Li;
00051     os << "[";
00052     for (Li = Lref.begin(); Li != Lref.end(); Li++) {
00053         os << *Li;
00054         if (++i < (int) Lref.size()) os << ", ";
00055     }
00056     os << "]";
00057     return os;
00058 }
